What is Black Friday?
Black Friday is one day of the year when retailers across the world offer huge discounts on their goods and services.
When is Black Friday?
Friday, 26 November 2021
How does the voucher work?
Sign up to Spin & Win, and get a voucher to use NOW, get early access to shop our Black Friday deals FIRST, and get exclusive vouchers to shop Black Friday deals online.
How do I shop Black Friday deals with homechoice?
We have a selection of easy and convenient ways to shop:
  • Shop online anytime, anywhere at homechoice.co.za
  • Visit any of our nationwide showrooms where you can experience our products in-person and get assistance from a friendly assistant.
  • Call in to our dedicated call centre to easily and conveniently place an order over the phone.
  • Download our app to browse and shop whenever you like.
  • Place an order through a registered homechoice Sales Agent.
How can I pay for my Black Friday shopping?
Sign up to spin & win great vouchers to shop our Black Friday deals early. You can also shop the sale on your homechoice account.
How can I shop your Black Friday deals faster?
  • Create an account now
  • Upload your documents (copy of your ID and proof of income)
  • Add the items you want to buy to your wish list or basket
  • Add the delivery address
How does “Shop Today, Pay in February” work?
Qualifying customers have the option to shop between now and December, and only start paying for their order in February 2022. Ts&Cs apply.
